attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is about:

* Banning cruelty 2day
* over 100 dogs & cats suffer or even die from some kind of cruelty
* over 100.00 whales dolphins etc die from cruelty by making money
* West Yorkshire is the worst area in Britain for animal cruelty
* Japan is the most popular for whale & dolphin hunting
* Alaska is most popular for wolves hunting

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
